4c4
< phosphorylation glycosylation and hydroxylation                                 = proteasomal degradation
---
> phosphorylation glycosylation and hydroxylation                                 = covalent modifications
15c15
< attachment of ubiquitin to defective proteins to tag for destruction            = covalent modifications
---
> attachment of ubiquitin to defective proteins to tag for destruction            = proteasomal degradation
